attributes.action: Ban production and importation of electronic products that are better as non electronic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we need a plug in air freshener that pumps out perfume 50 times a day? Why do we need an electronic salt or pepper mill? The answer is, we don't! It is a waste of valuable energy, and produces unneccessary carbon.
